arts.ttl: Scottish trio learn European league phase opponents
arts.sum: Celtic and Rangers will both host Roma and Braga in the Europa League as Aberdeen are drawn against Sparta Prague and AEK Athens in the Conference League.

arts.ttl: Marcelo Saracchi revealed as Celtic player out of the blue as he eyes Rangers baptism
arts.sum: The South American is training at Lennoxtown ahead of Sunday's huge clash at Ibrox
